trans-unit.resname: PDIS·140★ | Avatar of Discord | Card Text
trans-unit.source: ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) Flying When Avatar of Discord enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard two cards.

trans-unit.resname: PDIS·140★ | Avatar of Discord | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Such is the power of Rakdos that even his shadow takes on a cruel life of its own.
{2}{W}: Tap target creature. {2}{U}: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
